Header.title: when you feel stuck,we can help
Header.paragraph: We meet you where you are and help get you to where you want to go by tailoring treatments to your specific needs using evidence-based approaches.

About.paragraph: At LifeCycle Counselling we recognize how difficult it is to take the first step towards therapy, speak about your difficulties and explore uncomfortable emotions. We are a diverse group of therapists, many of whom have had our own mental health challenges and obstacles. We use client-centered approaches because we understand how important it is to meet you where you are. We respect differences, opinions, values, and attitudes. are. We respect differences, opinions, values, and attitudes. variety of issues and are familiar with various therapeutic modalities. We strive to provide services grounded in evidence-based approaches

Services.name: Individual Therapy
Services.text: This therapy service offers evidence-based approaches to help individuals with emotional regulation, personal growth, and a variety of mental health issues.

Services.name: Couples Therapy
Services.text: This couples therapy approach uses science-based techniques to help couples with communication, conflict resolution, intimacy, and various relationship issues

Services.name: Family Therapy
Services.text: Family therapy offers solutions to manage conflicts, improve communication, and overcome struggles, with expertise in areas such as parenting and behavioral issues
